com.ezrebclan.asset.core

Interface Saveable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Asset, BigTextAsset, ImageAsset, SmallTextAsset

    public interface Saveable
    A Saveable class can be "saved" (whatever that may mean is up to the class) using the save(OutputStream) method.
    Author:
    Mrab Ezreb
    See Also:
    Loadable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void save(java.io.OutputStream output)
      Saves a Saveable object to an OutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(java.io.OutputStream output)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves a Saveable object to an OutputStream
        Parameters:
        output - An OutputStream to save to. This is typically a FileOutputStream, but could be anything.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws any exceptions
